name: Kim
review: Sipping in the cup of Espresso is the best way which reminds me of the Nuclear as both of them are small in amount but tremendous in Energy

name: Isaac Neuton
review: I hate Apple,it ruined my Latte on that day.However,latte is good. When I sip that first time, i feel something in my stomach, from that day i was thinking about Gravity

name: Mahfuj Alam
review: My Heart Beeped on and become 'Hahakar' when I take a sip of Affogato for the first time .Then I start to make my great song

name: Monalisa
review: It's good to see Mocha all the time,I love it but can't afford to get it,Chocolate Mocha and me be like long distance relationship

name: Rabindranath
review: If Anupam knew the taste of Flat White,surely he could learn how to flirt with kallani,My Bad!I just take a shot of Flat white then thinking that if I have a shaving cream on that time

name: Xavier
review: A coffee is a coffee,if that coffee become coffee than it is more than a coffee
